name: DANGEROUS LINES
description:
Dangerous Lanes is my version of Crossy Road and I used Unity 3D to model and program it as a 3D pixel video game.

 I was asked by a couple of close people why to make a Crossy Road type of game and I said regardless of a game, I want it to be logical and coherent to design it without any complications and make it desirable! It didn't matter if I had significant experience or little experience in 3D games, Dangerous Lanes is a game where I can use my 3D pixel art graphics skills to produce a thrilling and exciting game from scratch. After designing all of the objects, I imported them into Unity. 

Thankfully, I have learned a great deal on C#, I can use it to control my characters and my AI characters. Using artificial intelligence makes Dangerous Lanes more interesting as the characters can use advanced techniques and I had to program animations to dynamically generate content. 

The items on Dangerous Lanes are chickens, roads, trees, rocks, cars, trucks and a ghost. I wanted Dangerous Lanes to be simple, therefore, the game menus, game over screens and score screen were basic and fundamental. 

There are no music or sound effects as I don't want to get into trouble with Youtube guidelines. 

Overall, Dangerous Lanes is a straightforward game for me to produce as all the skills I learned from previous games were applied to use the core foundations of creating a professional video game.

Controls: Left Mouse Drag Left (Move Left), Left Mouse Drag Right (Move Right), Left Mouse Drag Up (Move Up), Left Mouse Drag Down (Move Down,
